Articles.Content:
Hello. This is a thread where you can say who your favorite KSP youtuber is. The reason this isn't a poll is because there are more than 10 KSP youtubers, and I wouldn't want it to be biased. Also, don't start a flamewar.

Cheers!

Edited July 30, 2014 by Doge

Oh man, I love so many! Scott Manley is awesome, but so is HOCgaming, LeGoldFish, Danny2462 and EnterElysium.

EDIT: How could I forget Xacktar?!

EDIT 2: I FORGOT NASSAULT, TOO!

Edited July 30, 2014 by Thomas988
Either Scott Manley or Danny2462.
Scott Manley (hullo), then xacktar, then m1sz.

Although it doesn't really count. Macey Dean. And Nassault, for pretty obvious reasons

(I would say myself but I'm simply too much of a gentleman)

EDIT: Completely forgot some really good ones! OperationDx1, Bob Fitch and Danny2462.

Edited July 31, 2014 by HatBat
KurtJMac. Something about how he talks about stuff is very relateable to me. Also he was the first KSP YouTuber I ran across.

Robbaz

10char

Scott Manley and Nassault are the two obvious. I did watch HOCgaming but he got too annoying i.e. deliberately saying lithobreaking when 'crash' would've done and other things. Robbaz's humour is way too crude for my liking and I was subscribed to Kurt but I can't watch when he makes so many mistakes! I'm pretty picky when it comes to Youtubers to be honest.

I started playing KSP because of HOCGaming, enjoy watching Scott Manley, Nassaults videos are amazingly emotional, and my own videos are the result of me having fun. I wouldn't say any one of them were my favorite as I love them all!

Oh man, I love so many! Scott Manley is awesome, but so is HOCgaming, LeGoldFish, Danny2462 and EnterElysium.

EDIT: How could I forget Xacktar?!

Yep there are just too many to choose from.

Bob Fitch Youtube is the best !

http://www.youtube.com/user/BeazaYT
There's too many for me to choose from, but if I had to choose it would either be Scott Manley or Robbaz. I also really like Danny2462, kurtjmac, and Nassault.

Yep there are just too many to choose from.

Yup. I had to edit it again because I forgot yet another YouTuber. :|

The usual, I guess. I always watch Scott's videos.

Harv (HOCgaming) introduced me to the game and Scott (Manley) taught me how to play. Various others (KurtJMac, Nassault, Bob Fitch, Thor LP,etc.) have inspired me along the way.

Myself

10 char
Can it be all of them? I have so many KSP lets play subscriptions I just can't choose one...
It's a draw for me between Scott and Kurt. Scott is more informative, Kurt is funnier.

I'd say Scott Manley, Danny2462, and Kurtjmac. I watch Scott because he provides good tutorials and information, Danny because his videos always make me laugh, and Kurt because of how he acts whenever he makes a mistake.

Kurt because of how he acts whenever he makes a mistake.

So you like Kurt all the time, then?
Definitely Scott Manley.. With him, anything is possible. I also like Kurt because he was the one who made me find KSP. So, why hate him if he showed me something I like?
Not even a competition, Danny2462. I mean Scott Manley sometimes posts some pretty interesting things, but I have never once seen a new Danny video and thought, "Eh, I think I'll pass on that one".
Danny2462, of course. I like Scott too, but sometimes his videos are too long.

I must say, Danny2462 is my daily comedy source. I'll miss him tomorrow when I leave for vacation (without internet access). But, who can forget Shawn Esau, the creator of the legendary "Build Fly Dream" video?
None, I don't watch KSP.
Scott Manley, because .. SCIENCE! Good tutor not only on KSP but also on the real science behind it. I think ESA should hire him as the public relations go-to-guy ..
